title: Correlating Resonant Di-Higgs and Tri-Higgs Production to $H\to VV$ in the 2HDM
summary: The observation of resonant di-Higgs production, which would strongly suggest the existence of a new heavy neutral scalar $H$, has been searched for extensively at the LHC. In the two-Higgs doublet model (2HDM) with $m_H\gg m_h$, where $h$ is the Higgs boson of mass 125 GeV observed at the LHC, we show that a direct correlation emerges between Br$(H\to hh)$ and Br$(H\to VV)$, with $V=Z,W$, which depends only on $m_H$ (and $m_V$).
